Shiven Ramji manages Nielsenâ€™s mobile media and advertising effectiveness products and services globally. In this role, he is responsible for global product roadmap and strategy for audience measurement and advertiser effectiveness solutions across mobile screens. Shiven has expertise in the mobile web and mobile applications ecosystem including in-app advertising, in-app purchasing and the emergence of targeting on mobile phones and platforms.

Mr. Ramji specializes in online advertising (search, display, video, rich media), mobile advertising (display, in-app), connected devices (console gaming devices, tablets), cross-platform (TV, Online and Mobile), e-commerce and social media data and technologies.
